# playerbot_ai_module - CMakeLists.txt
# Auto-generated by TrinityCore MCP Server
# Generation date: 2025-11-01T10:01:47.759Z

# Playerbot Component: playerbot_ai_module

# Source files
set(playerbot_ai_module_SOURCES
    AI/BotAI.cpp
    AI/Combat/WarriorFuryStrategy.cpp
    AI/Combat/PaladinProtectionStrategy.cpp
    AI/Healing/PriestHolyStrategy.cpp
)

# Header files
set(playerbot_ai_module_HEADERS
    AI/BotAI.h
    AI/Combat/WarriorFuryStrategy.h
    AI/Combat/PaladinProtectionStrategy.h
    AI/Healing/PriestHolyStrategy.h
)

# Test files
set(playerbot_ai_module_TESTS
    Tests/WarriorFuryStrategyTest.cpp
    Tests/PaladinProtectionStrategyTest.cpp
)

# Group source files for IDE
source_group("Source Files" FILES ${ playerbot_ai_module_SOURCES})
source_group("Header Files" FILES ${ playerbot_ai_module_HEADERS})
source_group("Tests" FILES ${ playerbot_ai_module_TESTS})

# Create static library
add_library(playerbot_ai_module STATIC
    ${ playerbot_ai_module_SOURCES}
    ${ playerbot_ai_module_HEADERS}
)

# Dependencies
target_link_libraries(playerbot_ai_module
    game
    shared
)

# Include directories
target_include_directories(playerbot_ai_module PUBLIC
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/AI
)


# Tests
if(BUILD_TESTING)
    add_executable(playerbot_ai_module_tests
        ${ playerbot_ai_module_TESTS}
        ${ playerbot_ai_module_SOURCES}
        ${ playerbot_ai_module_HEADERS}
    )

    target_link_libraries(playerbot_ai_module_tests
        gtest
        gtest_main
        game
        shared
    )

    add_test(NAME playerbot_ai_module_tests COMMAND playerbot_ai_module_tests)
endif()

# Installation
install(TARGETS playerbot_ai_module
    LIBRARY DESTINATION lib
    ARCHIVE DESTINATION lib
)

install(FILES ${ playerbot_ai_module_HEADERS}
    DESTINATION include/modules/Playerbot/playerbot/ai/module
)
